text: Agar şumoro ʙimi on ast, ki dar kori jatimon adolat nakuned, az zanon har cī şumoro pisand aftad, du-du va se-se va cahor-cahor ʙa nikoh, darovared. Va agar ʙimi on dored, ki ʙa adolat raftor nakuned, tanho jak zan ʙigired jo har cī moliki on şaved. In rohe ʙehtar ast to ki zulmu sitam nakuned
